rules_text:
When Essence Archivist enters, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one into your hand, then integrate the other. [i](Exile it, then you may choose a nonland permanent it’s integrated onto.)[/i]
Permanents you control with cards integrated onto them have “Ward–Pay 3 life.”
notes:
!canoncard Phyrexian Rager
 101: Integrating is now optional.
